item.title: About my research
item.description: My research is broadly focused around three areas of interest: i) moral cognition; ii) memory and decision making; and, iii) social learning. I use multiple methodologies in my work including behavioral data, computational modelling, eye-tracking and physiology. My work emphasises the dynamic nature of social and cognitive processes. Moral cognition How are moral decisions made and to what extent do they rely on domain-general cognitive processes such as visual attention and information sampling?
